aboutMe.p1: I am a <c>Web Developer</c> based in the <c>Basque Country</c>. I consider myself a <c>problem-solver</c>, very <c>motivated</c>, passionate about <c>new technologies</c>, and constantly <c>evolving</c> and <c>learning</c>.
aboutMe.p2: I am deeply passionate about programming, enjoy <c>new challenges</c> and care deeply about <c>correct development</c>, <c>clean code</c> and <c>best practices</c> in my projects.
aboutMe.p3: Even though I live in <c>Spain</c>, I am open to working anywhere in the world. I speak <c>English</c> and would love to practice it!

oreka.title: Full Stack Web Developer
oreka.description: Full Stack web development and UI/UX design of React and Next.js-based cross-platform applications integrated with SAP systems and business management solutions.

gestioma.title: Full Stack Web Developer
gestioma.description: Full-stack web development of React and Next.js-based applications related to Civil Engineering, 3D modeling, and BIM systems.
